answers.answer: I had gestational diabetes but mine was extremely bad to the point where I had to inject myself everyday with insulin and do blood work 3x a day. I believe they will only induce you if your glucose levels are high? Mine were at 15 and more.

question: has anyone had gestacional diabetes and already had a non stress test? do they then tell u ur induce date or what? because my obgy tld me that someone with GD cant go past 41 weeks due to the risks of baby growing too big is this true?
title: plz answer
